initiate.description: Create an auth key. Also specify if generated key should be long or short.

initiate_using_key.description: Create an auth key. Key is provided.

revoke.description: Revoke a key, it will no longer be honoured. It's underlying user's sessions will also be invalidated.

extend.description: Extend a key's life, it will be honoured for longer.

get_token.description: Will return a user_session id for the underlying user (use user_session/read to get the actual token). Will fail if key has been revoked/expired.
